oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Brodie helmet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This steel helmet is the M1917A1 with an intact leather liner and webbed chin strap. The model was standard U.S. issue from the 1920s to the early days of World War II. The helmet shell is stamped "194/ZD" on the underside of the brim. The M1917A1 helmet was created by replacing the original liner of the M1917 of World War 1914-1918 with an improved liner.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
